about_the_game:
Unravel the mysteries of a mirrored world in Pounce and the Twin Trees, a captivating platformer adventure!

***EARLY DEVELOPMENT UNDERWAY! CONCEPT ART SHOWN***

Embark on a thrilling journey as Pounce, a curious young tiger cub blessed with the power of the Twin Trees. Pounce learns the world's harsh realities as a dark enemy threatens everything he loves. Explore a vibrant world brimming with lush landscapes and navigate the treacherous depths of the mirrored realm, a twisted reflection of reality. Master Pounce's agility and utilize his unique abilities like his pounce attack and magic-infused claws to overcome challenging platforming sections and outsmart cunning enemies.

Key Features:


  • Traverse a captivating world: Explore diverse environments, from sun-dappled forests to the chilling mirrored realm, each with its own unique challenges and secrets to uncover.

  • Master the art of movement: Utilize Pounce's feline agility to perform graceful leaps, cling to walls, and navigate treacherous platforms.

  • Face the mirrored menace: Encounter familiar foes reborn in the mirrored realm, each offering a unique twist on their original form. Think fast and adapt your tactics to overcome these corrupted adversaries.

  • Unravel the mysteries of the Twin Trees: Uncover the secrets of the ancient Twin Trees and harness their power to manipulate the world around you.

  • A thrilling adventure: Experience exhilarating chase sequences that will test your reflexes and platforming skills to the limit. Can Pounce outsmart his pursuers and reach safety?

  • A visual spectacle: Immerse yourself in a vibrant world brought to life with stunning visuals and a captivating soundtrack.

Are you ready to join Pounce on his unforgettable adventure? Add Pounce and the Twin Trees to your wishlist today!
